Name: Chain Deployment
Description: Trigger a deployment for another project in Octopus

Parameters.Name: Chain_ApiKey
Parameters.Label: API Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API Key to use for authentication

Parameters.Name: Chain_ProjectName
Parameters.Label: Project Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the project to trigger a deployment for

Parameters.Name: Chain_DeployTo
Parameters.Label: Deploy to Environment
Parameters.HelpText: The Environment to deploy the Release to

Parameters.Name: Chain_CreateOption
Parameters.Label: Release Creation Behaviour
Parameters.HelpText:
- **Create if Release doesn't exist** - Creates a new Release only if it doesn't already exist.
- **Create new Release** - Creates a new release. This will fail if the Release already exists.
- **Don't create a Release** - Assume the Release already exists and will fail if creation fails.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
Try|Create if Release doesn't exist
Create|Create a new Release
NoCreate|Don't create a Release
